item.title: core add
item.description:
core add by DC :
Added to the document-v20 DTD to support usemap attribute in img tag. Also added demonstration of client-side imagemap to the "seed site". Thanks to Tamara Harpster.

item.title: docs update
item.description:
docs update by JJP :
Added FAQ to explain character encoding for certain languages. Thanks to Joao Ferreira.

item.title: core add
item.description:
core add by RDG :
Enable sitemap plugins. Plugins allow Forrest to have functionality added through the addition of small code blocks (plugins). Plugins are downloaded automatically when a site that requries them is built. See Extending Forrest with Plugins.

item.title: core update
item.description:
core update by JJP :
Update fop0.20.5 just with optional jimi support. This fixes the issue building the apache fop site. Replace libraries from the cocoon 2.2.0-dev version.

item.title: core add
item.description:
core add by DC :
The brokenlinks file now contains referer information. Upgraded lib/core/cocoon.jar and added attribute "show-referrers" to the Cocoon cli.xconf Thanks to Upayavira.
